text: Aglaia samoensis is a species of tree in the family Meliaceae. It is found in American Samoa, New Guinea, Samoa, the Solomon Islands, Vanuatu, and Wallis and Futuna Islands. ==References== samoensis Category:Trees of Papuasia Category:Flora of the Southwestern Pacific Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1854
title: Aglaia samoensis
